committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Assistance and Unemployment Compensation

official_title: A bill to repeal the provision of the Omnibus Reconciliation Act of 1981 which provides that certain ex-service members will not be eligible for unemployment compensation.

summary.text: Amends the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1981 to repeal the provision of such Act which makes certain ex-service members ineligible for unemployment compensation.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the provision of the Omnibus Reconciliation Act of 1981 which provides that certain ex-service members will not be eligible for unemployment compensation.
